aboutMe.thingsILike: I'm an avid fan of comics, manga, rock music, games, movies, series and anime, a true geek.

programmingCard.title: Programming
programmingCard.text1: The act of writing code, for a computer to execute
programmingCard.text2: , this is the definition of what is programming, according to Google, for me a better definition would be
programmingCard.text3: the act of turning abstract ideas into something that solves a problem
programmingCard.text4: and this idea is very interesting, maybe that's why I do it with enthusiasm and passion, always looking for ways to solve problems.
